```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
rstats_tweets <- readRDS(here("rstats_tweets.rds"))
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)

``````{r}
rstats.with.month<-rstats_tweets %>% 
  mutate(month = lubridate::round_date(rstats_tweets$created_at, unit="month"))
```
```{r}
plot2.dat <- count(rstats.with.month$month)
```
